solution.text:
Given pair of equations are:
_{i}_x + _{j}_y = _{k}_ and _{j}_x + _{i}_y = _{l}_.
_{i}_x + _{j}_y - _{k}_ = 0 -------(1)
_{j}_x + _{i}_y - _{l}_ = 0 -------(2)
Comparing with general equations, we get:
\(a_1 = _{i}_ ,a_2 = _{j}_ ,b_1 = _{j}_ ,b_2 = _{i}_\)
Here,
\({a_1\over a_2} \neq {b_1\over b_2}\)
Hence, given pair of equations have unique solution

content.text:
Check whether the following pair of equation has unique solution, no solution or infinitely many solution.
_{i}_x + _{j}_y = _{k}_ and _{j}_x + _{i}_y = _{l}_.
